data.name: CometStriker Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Includes the CometStriker Soundtrack by Terrel O'Brien in FLAC and MP3 featuring 27 tracks.

Songs will be placed in your CometStriker\Extras folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\CometStriker\Extras\CometStriker Soundtrack FLAC/MP3

01. Main Menu, CometStriker
02. Welcome Back Lt. Striker
03. Mission Briefing
04. Under Aquario
05. Mini Boss
06. Guardian of the Sea, Launcher Crab
07. Flight though Floreau
08. Her Royal Majesty, Queen Beetle
09. Invading Bassor
10. Brain of Bassor, LIYX Central Intelligence System
11. Scouting Aris
12. Junk Commander
13. Biostation
14. Biostation, Final Corridors
15. Biostation Defender, Reanimator
16. Biostation Defender, Internal Defense System
17. Heart of Biostation
18. Escape
19. Parasite Leader
20. Striker Comes Home
21. Credits
22. Where is Striker… ?
23. Striker Located
24. Boss Rush Chamber
25. Game Over
26. Core
27. Mission Results

Includes the CometStriker Soundtrack by Terrel O'Brien in FLAC and MP3 featuring 27 tracks.

Songs will be placed in your CometStriker\Extras folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\CometStriker\Extras\CometStriker Soundtrack FLAC/MP3

data.short_description: Includes the CometStriker Soundtrack by Terrel O'Brien in FLAC and MP3 featuring 27 tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel/AMD CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.3 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel/AMD CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel/AMD CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
